text:
~MvAva yaH pava#tEq sa yaqj~jastamEqva sAqkShAdA ra#BatE muqShTI ka#rOtiq vAca#M ~MyacCati yaqj~jasyaq dhRutyAq adI$kShiShTAqyaM brA$hmaqNa itiq triru#pAq(gg)qSvA#ha dEqvEBya# EqvainaqM prA&&*haq triruqccairuqBayE$Bya Eqvaina#M dEvamanuqShyEByaqH prA&&*haq na puqrA nakSha#trEByOq vAcaqM ~Mvi sRu#jEqd-yatpuqrA nakSha#trEByOq 
vAca#M ~MvisRuqjEd-yaqj~jaM ~MvicCi#ndyAq - [  ] 27
